answers.answer: Our vision dose getting bit worst when pregnant, bt iam not sure abt all this dark spots so just contact ur doc or midwife and let them know abt it... All best x
I'd go have blood pressure and urine checked for preeclampsia.
I tried to explain the same thing to my boyfriend awhile back. He thought I was crazy!
I've never heard of that, but would definitely get it checked out.

They already checked my urine and it was good and I do have high blood pressure, before I got pregnant, so I'm taking medicine, but yeah and is only when I'm sleeping and open my eyes, I get scared cause I really think there's flies in my room
I agree with snowdin28 you should get your blood pressure checked out for pre clampsia
I'm gonna call my nurse then

question: Is it normal to have visions in pregnancy? Sometimes I wake up in the middle of the night and I see a bunch of dark spots and I think is a bunch of flies in the room, my husband is getting scared because I wake him up nervous, and it starting to happen when I got pregnant, am I the only one?
title: visions
